member.name: T:Drill4Net.Injector.Strategies.Flow.FlowProbeHelper
member.summary: Helper for the generating the cross-point's probe data

member.name: M:Drill4Net.Injector.Strategies.Flow.FlowProbeHelper.GenerateProbeData(Drill4Net.Injector.Core.MethodContext,Drill4Net.Profiling.Tree.CrossPoint)
member.summary: Generates the main part of cross-point's probe data.
member.param: The cross-point of the target code.

member.name: M:Drill4Net.Injector.Strategies.Flow.FlowProbeHelper.GenerateSpecificProbeData(Drill4Net.Profiling.Tree.CrossPoint)
member.summary: Generates the specific probe data - its type, id, etc (as a rule for the debugging).
member.param: The cross-point of the target code.
